ome.smuggler.web

Class TaskFileStoreAdapter<T extends util.object.Identifiable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ome.smuggler.web.TaskFileStoreAdapter<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImportFailureController, MailFailureController

    public abstract class TaskFileStoreAdapter<T extends util.object.Identifiable>
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the means to make the functionality of a TaskFileStore available to web clients.

      • cacheStrategy

        protected java.util.function.Consumer<javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse> cacheStrategy()
        Returns:
        the HTTP caching strategy to use when streaming files to the client; defaults to caching forever.
        See Also:
        Caches

      • listTaskFileUrlPaths

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public java.lang.String[] listTaskFileUrlPaths()
        Returns:
        the URL root paths to access each of the files currently in the store.

      • streamFileOr404

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                value="{taskId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> streamFileOr404(@PathVariable(value="taskId")
                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String taskId,
                                                                                                                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                                                                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Looks up the file associated to a task using the task ID and streams that file to the client if found; otherwise outputs a 404 to the client.
        Parameters:
        taskId - the ID of the task associated to the file.
        response - the response to use to stream the file.
        Returns:
        dummy entity to make this work with Spring MVC.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs while reading and streaming the file.

      • deleteFile

        @RequestMapping(method=DELETE,
                value="{taskId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> deleteFile(@PathVariable(value="taskId")
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String taskId)
        Removes the file associated to a task if it is in the store; does nothing otherwise.
        Parameters:
        taskId - the ID of the task associated to the file.
        Returns:
        a 204 response to the client.
